## Running Code

#SEMANA 14

```{r}
#IMPORTAMOS LA DATA
data<- read_csv("C:/Users/Dell/Downloads/covid_19 (2).csv")
View(covid_19_2_)

```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#Vemos las 6 primeras filas 
head(data)
```

```{r}
#Estructura de la data 
str(data)
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE TENDENCIA CENTRAL 
#MEDIA ARITMETICA 
mean(data$Derivation.cohort)
mean(data$severidad)
```

```{r}
#MEDIANA 
median(data$Derivation.cohort)
median(data$severidad)

```

```{r}
#MODA (DERIVATION.COHORT, SEVERIDAD) 
mode_Derivation.cohort<- names(sort(table(data$Derivation.cohort),decreasing = TRUE))
mode_severidad<- names(sort(table(data$severidad),decreasing = TRUE))
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE DISPERSION 
#VARIANZA 
var(data$Derivation.cohort,na.rm = TRUE)
var(data$severidad,na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#DESVIACION ESTANDAR
sd(data$Derivation.cohort,na.rm = TRUE)
sd(data$severidad,na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO
range(data$Derivation.cohort,na.rm = TRUE)
range(data$severidad,na.rm = TRUE)

```

```{r}
#RANGO INTERCUARTILICO
IQR(data$Derivation.cohort,na.rm = TRUE)
IQR(data$severidad,na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE POSICION
quantile(data$Derivation.cohort,probs = c(0.25,0.5,0.75,0.90),na.rm = TRUE) 
quantile(data$severidad,probs = c(0.25,0.5,0.75,0.90),na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RESUMEN 
summary(data$Derivation.cohort)
summary(data$severidad)

```

```{r}
#RESUMEN DE TODAS LAS VARIABLES 
summary(data)

```

```{r}
#VISUALIZACION GRAFICA 
#HISTOGRAMA 
ggplot(data,aes(x=Derivation.cohort))+geom_histogram(bins = 30)+theme_minimal()
ggplot(data,aes(x=severidad))+geom_histogram(bins = 30)+theme_minimal()
```
